name: Emtjets - Uber for Private Jet Travel
slogan: The Uber for Private Jet Travel targets a $40 Billion Annual Marketplace
description:
In a $40 Billion annual charter marketplace Emtjets (EJ), the Uber for private jet travel is merging Innovation, AI/ML Technology & Aviation to provide the first disruptive tech model for the Private Jet industry. 

Emtjets - Uber for private jet travel has revolutionised the Jet Charter, Leasing & Sales industry by offering a trading marketplace with access to over 1,000+ companies & 4,000 Aircraft worldwide through its global network. Emtjets has created the first Online Auction Marketplace for Brokers and Aircraft Companies to cross-sell with each other for their customers Charter, Lease or Sale, resulting in significant savings & increased Aircraft options for their clients.

The Emtjets platform provides an alternative, by offering clients access to the following:

• The largest online B2B and B2C Private Jet booking platform worldwide • Offering real-time quotations & availability in just 4 hours
• The most cost effective options throughout the industry for Charter, Leasing & Sales
• Providing clients instant access to over 1000+ Aircraft companies & 4,000 Aircraft prices worldwide
• A much more seamless, transparent & efficient experience when buying & selling through the online Emtjets Marketplace

Our customer base includes: UHNWI’s, Royalty, Leading Company Executives, Political Leaders & Stars of the Music & Film industry. "Emtjets' reputation is based on providing the highest level of service & we pride ourselves on this. This gives the client peace of mind & freedom to travel according to their own schedule." We like to keep up to date on all aspects of the Aviation industry, which ensures we are always one step ahead of the rest. The way in which we wish to portray ourselves is "Unprecedented, Competitive & Exclusive."

team.title: CEO
team.name: Adrian Twibill
team.bioHtml: Founder & CEO across Fintech, Proptech & Traveltech: @WREX = Salesforce + Zillow tech combined, @Emtjets - Uber for Private Jet Travel & @Investrs

jobs.title: Emtjets - Uber for Private Jets is Looking for global Senior Vice President (SVP)
jobs.description:
Emtjets - "Uber for Private Jet Travel"


Company Description:

For over 10 years Emtjets Global has supported the likes of Royalty, UHNWI's, musicians, models, sporting stars and high-ranking execs all use private jets, super yachts and helicopters to travel. 

Our Private Jets division has chartered helicopters, super yachts and private jets for everything from meetings and business acquisitions to catwalk debuts and proposals. Every day offers up new challenges, with internal progression and planned expansion creating vacancies for new talent to join our current sales team.

We are currently expanding and exploring the potential for a SVP to assist in building the business, this opportunity will offer the chance to work with an exciting and rapidly expanding Uber Jet start-up with global sights. 

What we are looking for:

The SVP will be responsible for growing company services/revenue through the successful selling of Emtjets to UHNWI's, musicians, models, sports teams, stars and high-ranking c-level execs, as well as building the Emtjets brand by developing a clearly differentiated brand positioning, implementing integrated sales and strategy plans for all offerings under the firm’s product portfolio. Creating new product offerings and structuring sales funnels to help expand Emtjets marketplace.

This individual will be directly responsible for identifying/leveraging their contacts to promote business development across all aspects of the Emtjets enterprise and global growth strategy; includes developing strategic relationships/partnerships, building and managing sales pipelines, and maximizing revenue globally. Handling escalations and participating directly in
complex sales situations to negotiate and/or resolve disputes and ensure customer satisfaction. Conducts regional sales forecasts, growth forecast, territory planning, demand generation, deal strategy development and trend analysis.

Assists in the creation of division strategy and consults with senior management in providing direction to ensure growth and financial success. Ensures a consistent approach of organizational policies and procedures. Demonstrated leadership and people management skills. Strong communication skills, analytical skills, thorough understanding of product development and product management.

• Develop plans and strategies for developing business and achieving the company’s sales goals. 
• Create a culture of success and ongoing business and goal achievement – possibly more important than the first item on this list.
• Driving sales executive performance in a client-oriented solution selling approach, across our enterprise portfolio.
• Defining sales strategies and market campaigns identifying market opportunities and maximizing pipeline development and conversion.
• Building a platform for identifying new customer contacts, securing and leading sales meeting with new contacts and co-coordinating subject matter expert input in support of these meetings.
• End to end responsibility for leading opportunities through the deal cycle.
• Managing customer requirement - influencing strategy and Solution options, through to defining and enacting a sales closure plan and contract negotiations.
• Accountable for certain client relationships; typically working from senior decision maker level to c-level.


Job Requirments:

- Bring your own clients, establishing a portfolio of clients, identifying new clients through cold calling, networking and managing online inquiries
- Ability to demonstrate an expert understanding of the aircraft and chartering process
- Building long term beneficial relationships with both clients and supplier
- Managing executive charter bookings from inquiry to completion
- Flight watching/overseeing flight departures (this might be unsociable hours)
- Ability to exceed sales financial targets
- Hardworking and flexible
- Ambition, drive and self-motivation
- Exceptional communication skills
- Excellent problem solving and negotiation skills
- Strong resilience with the ability to thrive working under pressure

Additional Important Information:

- No basic, but very high "uncapped" commission structure with the ability to earn $150-200k+ p/a! We look after our staff and believe in fair opportunities for those who deliver. 
- Growth opportunities to build your own sales team and expand offices globally. 
- Depending of level and revenue generated, C-level position and equity options available for the right individual. 
- A friendly, fun and exciting environment surrounded by some of the best in the industry
- Pushing the technical AI boundaries, seeing the company grow globally becoming a mainstream name within the Private Jet industry.
- Rapid growth with the company through its global expansion.
- Mirroring the tech model and expanding into multiple markets such as: Yachts and Helicopters.
- Exiting within 5 years via IPO or trade sale.
- Be apart of a disruptive Travel Tech Uber model which is looking to redefine the industry as we know it.


To apply to this job, click Apply Now

  • A friendly, fun and exciting environment surrounded by some of the best in the industry
  • Pushing the technical AI boundaries, seeing the company grow globally becoming a mainstream name within the Private Jet industry.
  • Rapid growth with the company through its global expansion.
  • Mirroring the tech model and expanding into multiple markets such as: Yachts and Helicopters.
  • Exiting within 5 years via IPO or trade sale.
  • Be apart of a disruptive Travel Tech Uber model which is looking to redefine the industry as we know it.

To apply to this job, click Apply Now

jobs.title: EMTJETS (Uber for Private Jet Travel) - seeking COO or CMO
jobs.description:
In a $40 Billion annual charter marketplace Emtjets (EJ), the Uber for private jet travel is merging Innovation, AI/ML Technology & Aviation to provide the first disruptive tech model for the Private Jet industry. Emtjets provides our clients with direct access to over 1,600 Aircraft Companies & 4,000 Aircraft Worldwide..

For over 10 years Emtjets Global has supported the likes of Royalty, UHNWI's, musicians, models, sporting stars and high-ranking execs all use private jets, super yachts and helicopters to travel.

We are currently expanding and exploring the potential for a COO and CMO to assist in building the business, this opportunity will offer the chance to work with an exciting and rapidly expanding start-up with global sights.

This role is ideal for ambitious, intelligent and entrepreneurial individuals looking to build a lucrative and exciting career with a revolutionary company within the AI & ML Traveltech space.

What we are looking for:

- Co-Founder, a forward thinker pushing the boundaries of a very exciting company within a $40 Billion annual marketplace
- If CMO we are looking for a growth hacker, someone who is a marketing guru, with history of scaling companies or working with IPO's.
- Ideally knowledge of the Luxury Travel industry with contacts within this space is a big bonus.
- Involvement in all future planning and expansion aspects of the company
- Building sales funnels, affiliate partnerships and key relationships to help increase rapid growth globally.
- Help raising capital to gain further traction and expansion
- Extremely attractive prospects with uncapped commission structures.
- Ability to build and oversee a global team.

The CMO and COO will be responsible for growing company services/revenue through the successful selling of Emtjets to UHNWI's, musicians, models, sports teams, stars and high-ranking c-level execs, as well as building the Emtjets brand by developing a clearly differentiated brand positioning, implementing integrated sales and strategy plans for all offerings under the firm’s product portfolio. Creating new product offerings and structuring sales funnels to help expand Emtjets marketplace.

This individual will be directly responsible for identifying/leveraging their contacts to promote business development across all aspects of the Emtjets global growth strategy; includes developing strategic relationships/partnerships, building and managing sales pipelines, and maximizing revenue globally. Handling escalations and participating directly in complex sales situations to negotiate and/or resolve disputes and ensure customer satisfaction. Conducts regional sales forecasts, growth forecast, territory planning, demand generation, deal strategy development and trend analysis.

What you get back:

- Co-Founder CMO/COO status.
- This role is initially sweat equity based only - A salary will be provided upon completion of next round raise. (Depending on experience and time invested in the company we would evaluate the equity and salary)
- Pushing the technical AI boundaries, seeing the company grow globally becoming a mainstream name within the Travel industry
- Rapid growth with the company through its global expansion
- Mirroring the tech model and expanding into multiple markets such as: Superyachts and Helicopters.
- Exiting within 5 years via IPO or trade sale
- Be apart of a disruptive Proptech model which is looking to redefine the industry as we know it.

To apply to this job, click Apply Now

jobs.title: Uber for private jets is looking for a CTO Co-Founder to join a very exciting traveltech company
jobs.description:
In a $40 Billion annual charter marketplace Emtjets (EJ), the Uber for private jet travel is merging Innovation, AI/ML Technology & Aviation to provide the first disruptive tech model for the Private Jet industry. Emtjets provides our clients with direct access to over 1,600 Aircraft Companies & 4,000 Aircraft Worldwide..

For over 10 years Emtjets Global has supported the likes of Royalty, UHNWI's, musicians, models, sporting stars and high-ranking execs all use private jets, super yachts and helicopters to travel.

We have already built the technology for the proptech industry and looking to pivot it into the private aviation sector. 

We are currently expanding and exploring the potential for a CTO to assist in building the technology, this opportunity will offer the chance to work with an exciting and rapidly expanding start-up with global sights. 

This role is ideal for ambitious, intelligent and entrepreneurial individuals looking to build a lucrative and exciting career with a revolutionary company within the AI & ML Traveltech space.

What we are looking for:

- Co-Founder, a forward thinker pushing the boundaries of a very exciting company within a $40 Billion annual marketplace
- Knowledge of the Aviation industry is preferrable but not madatory. 
- Using our existing technology to build out a global private jet marketplace for B2B and B2C. 
- Incorporating AI & ML technologies 
- Involvement in all future planning and expansion aspects of the company
- Building affiliate partnerships and relationships to help increase rapid growth
- Help raising capital to gain further traction and expansion 
- Planning, development and testing of the platform
- Development of the Emtjets infrastructure, SaaS, etc. 
- Big Data 
- Third party API data feed integration. 
- Preferably from a financial technical background, but not mandatory

What you get back:

- An equity stake in the company. (Depending on experience and involvement with the company we would increase or decrease this accordingly)
- Salary provied and bonus upon raise of seed round which we are looking at 500-1m+. 
- Pushing the technical AI and blockchain boundaries, seeing the company grow globally becoming a mainstream name within the industry
- Rapid growth with the company through its global expansion
- Mirroring the tech model and expanding into multiple markets
- Exiting within 5 years via IPO or trade sale

Be apart of a disruptive Aviation traveltech model which is looking to redefine the industry as we know it...
